Package com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.excptions.contolleradvicer

Class CustomExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.digitinary.taskmangament.excptions.contolleradvicer.CustomExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class CustomExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for handling specific exceptions across the application. This class uses Spring's ControllerAdvice to handle exceptions and return appropriate HTTP responses.

    • handleValidationExceptions

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class) @ResponseStatus(BAD_REQUEST) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> handleValidationExceptions(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException ex)
      Handles validation exceptions thrown during method argument validation.
      Parameters:
      ex - The MethodArgumentNotValidException containing details of validation errors.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a map of validation errors and an HTTP status of BAD_REQUEST.

    • handleEmailExistExceptions

      @ExceptionHandler(DuplicateUserExecption.class) @ResponseStatus(CONFLICT) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> handleEmailExistExceptions(DuplicateUserExecption ex)
      Handles exceptions for duplicate user emails.
      Parameters:
      ex - The DuplicateUserExecption containing the error message.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the error message and an HTTP status of CONFLICT.
